Class Driver

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.cmput301fa16t5.legendary_telegram.RiderDriverParent
      • com.cmput301fa16t5.legendary_telegram.Driver

  • public class Driver
extends RiderDriverParent
    Created by keith on 11/2/2016. Driver class. User has one of these, calls upon it. Does not have a User.

    • Field Detail

      • cardToRequest

        private IdentificationCard cardToRequest
        List of Requests to be provided by Map and ESearch Request currently focusing on. The IdentificationCard is to "idiot proof" the code. Basically, what happens if you post an acceptance/commit of a request and then decide to change your user info? For that request, it will always be static.
